title: Scalable Performance Tuning of Hadoop MapReduce: A Noisy Gradient Approach
excerpt: The paper is about automatic Hadoop tuning using noisy gradient approach.
citation: S. Kumar, S. Padakandla, C. L, P. Parihar, G. K and S. Bhatnagar, "Scalable Performance Tuning of Hadoop MapReduce: A Noisy Gradient Approach," 2017 IEEE 10th International Conference on Cloud Computing (CLOUD), Honolulu, CA, 2017, pp. 375-382.
